item.title: Creative Post Layout
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" full_height="yes" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="3710" css=".vc_custom_1493378508237{background-position: 0 0;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1492699020382{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1492699433671{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="A Custom Layout for Articles" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:42|text_align:center|color:%233a3a3a|line_height:1.2" google_fonts="font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1492699286970{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_separator color="custom" border_width="3" el_width="10" accent_color="#d89145"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1492699301217{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

Visual Composer can help you to create a custom layout for your articles or article list. Scroll down to see how you can easily place your articles in a form that has been taken from an award winning website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1493217849962{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3711" img_size="large" alignment="center"][vc_custom_heading text="An Easy Way to Build a Layout" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:32|text_align:center|color:%233a3a3a|line_height:1.2" google_fonts="font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1492693880202{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1492693907252{margin-bottom: 15px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

There is an easy way for you to build a cool WordPress blog layout in seconds.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward" color="custom" align="center" custom_color="#d89145" link="|||" css=".vc_custom_1493378825637{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="3713" img_size="large" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1493378583796{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="3712" img_size="large" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1493378595428{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Enhance Your Creativity" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:32|text_align:center|color:%233a3a3a|line_height:1.2" google_fonts="font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1492693938936{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1492693963569{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"]

Use inspiring templates for pro designers to enhance your website and creativity.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward" color="custom" align="center" custom_color="#d89145" link="|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="How to Build a Custom Post" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:42|text_align:left|color:%233a3a3a|line_height:1.2" google_fonts="font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1492692010971{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1492692020902{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text 0=""]You can use a page builder to create a custom layout for your posts or pages. The custom layout will allow you to apply unique style and identity to your WordPress website and blog articles. You are no longer limited to your theme options and layout, Visual Composer has all the tools and elements required for you to build your layout on top of any WordPress theme. It really doesn't matter if you have a free or a premium theme, with Visual Composer you can power both.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Use content elements in combination with the powerful Design Options of Visual Composer to apply CSS properties. Divide your articles into columns or set asynchronous position to raise awareness.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1492692029021{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_btn title="Try Visual Composer for Free" style="custom" custom_background="#d89145" custom_text="#ffffff" size="lg" align="center" link="|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
